marklogic.body: Says who? you. who the f--k are you, Josh Jones? mind your business. if you cannot take the Heat, get the hell out the kitchen.Â yes, he is advocating violence. you do not meet raw aggression with niceness.Â There was a time when the people of the world looked at AA during the civil rights and were encouraged to throw colonial england and other western colonial nations. now, we have to look to people around the world who have successful thrown Off the western powers thru sheer determination and purpose. we cannot feel that america is all mighty and cannot be brought down. it can be brought down; it should be brought down and we need to learn from those people who are doing it everyday, ask for their help; train with them and take the devil white man down, period.
